mapper.select: SELECT spu.id, spu.title, spu.description, spu.price, spu.discount_price, spu.tags, sd.img AS display_img, si.img AS introduce_img, sku.id AS sku_id, sku.spu_id AS spu_id FROM spu LEFT JOIN spu_display sd ON spu.id = sd.spu_id AND sd.online = 1 AND sd.delete_time IS NULL LEFT JOIN spu_introduce si ON spu.id = si.spu_id AND si.online = 1 AND si.delete_time IS NULL LEFT JOIN sku ON spu.id = sku.spu_id AND sku.online = 1 AND sku.delete_time IS NULL WHERE spu.id = #{spuId} AND spu.online = 1 AND spu.delete_time IS NULL ORDER BY sd.sort, si.sort
